title: DAO of Life
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Juice bar, Asian, Fusion
description: Eco cafe and community learning centre offering a dairy-free menu with soups, salads, daily specials. Uses nut based milks or fresh coconut milk in the drinks and house-made ice cream. Free Wi-Fi. Kitchen closes 9:30pm. Est. 2014 originally on Ekareach St then on Serendipity Beach Rd then moved here in 2016. NOTE: Please send new, exact / correct map coordinates to happycow!
